data.title: Speech of Acceptance Upon The Award of The Nobel Prize For Literature, Delivered in Stockholm on the Tenth of December Nineteen Hundred and Fifty-Seven
data.meta_description: New York: Alfred A. Knopf, 1958. First edition. Small softcover. 14 pages. Features the text of Camus' speech along with the brief citation by Dr. Anders Osterling of the Swedish Academy. A very near fine copy in stapled wrappers and with a laid in memorandum sheet from Blanche W. Knopf and a black and white portrait of Camus by Yousuf Karsh. Item #192327
data.text:
New York: Alfred A. Knopf, 1958. First edition. Small softcover. 14 pages. Features the text of Camus' speech along with the brief citation by Dr. Anders Osterling of the Swedish Academy. A very near fine copy in stapled wrappers and with a laid in memorandum sheet from Blanche W. Knopf and a black and white portrait of Camus by Yousuf Karsh.

Item #192327
